subject: Two Thousand Fourteen
Olympic Games (2014)
Athletics and Sports
Basketball
Football
Baseball
Soccer
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Although misconduct and violence dominated much of the sports landscape this year, a select few sports figures stood above the fray and provided reasons to be thankful.
snippet: Although misconduct and violence dominated much of the sports landscape this year, a select few sports figures stood above the fray and provided reasons to be thankful.
